Test Name: Immunoglobulin A (IgA) Heavy and Light Chain (HLC) Pairs, Kappa and Lambda with Ratio
Purpose: To measure IgA heavy and light chain kappa and lambda pairs and calculate their ratio for diagnosing and monitoring plasma cell and related disorders.
Container: Serum tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer validated for IgA HLC measurement
